short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Annotates EWM work item references in the commit comment in GitHub and provides a work item picker in a pull/merge request.
short.cs: Toto rozšíření anotuje odkazy na pracovní položku EWM v komentáři potvrzení v úložišti GitHub s odkazy na pracovní položky EWM.
short.de: Diese Erweiterung annotiert EWM-Arbeitselementverweise im Commit-Kommentar in einem GitHub-Repository mit Links zu…
short.es: Esta extensión anota las referencias del elemento de trabajo EWM en el comentario de confirmación en un repositorio GitHub con…
short.fr: Cette extension annote les références d'élément de travail EWM dans le commentaire de validation dans un référentiel GitHub avec…
short.hu: Ez a kiterjesztés a GitHub lerakatban lévő véglegesítési megjegyzésben található EWM munkaelem hivatkozásokat megjelöli EWM…
short.it: Questa estensione annota i riferimenti all'elemento di lavoro EWM nel commento di commit in un repository GitHub con repository con…
short.ja: この拡張機能は、EWM ワークアイテムへのリンクを使用して、GitHub リポジトリーのコミット・コメント内の EWM ワークアイテムへの参照に注釈を付けます。
short.ko: 이 확장은 EWM 작업 항목 링크가 있는 GitHub 저장소의 커미트 주석에 EWM 작업 항목 참조에 대한 어노테이션을 작성합니다.
short.pl: To rozszerzenie umożliwia tworzenie adnotacji dla odwołań do elementów pracy produktu EWM w komentarzu zatwierdzenia w repozytorium…
short.pt_BR: Esta extensão anota as referências do item de trabalho do EWM no comentário da confirmação em um repositório do GitHub com links…
short.ru: Это расширение добавляет аннотации к ссылкам на задания EWM в комментариях о фиксации в хранилище GitHub.
short.tr: Bu uzantı, EWM iş öğeleri bağlantıları içeren bir GitHub havuzundaki kesinleştirme açıklamasında yer alan EWM iş öğesi…
short.zh_TW: 此擴充功能會透過指向 EWM 工作項目的鏈結，在 GitHub 儲存庫的確定註解中標註 EWM 工作項目參照。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
This extension annotates EWM work item references in the commit comment with links to work items and provides a work item picker. You can use this extension if you are using IBM Engineering Workflow Management integration with GitHub Enterprise or GitLab.

In a GitHub repository Web UI, this extension will annotate the work item references in commit comments. Clicking the work item link will open the work item in Engineering Workflow Management Web UI. In any GitHub or GitLab repository web UI, you can select work items from a work item picker and insert the work item numbers into a pull request and merge request description respectively.

Supported Git variants:
GitHub Enterprise.
GitLab Community and Enterprise.
long.cs,de,es,fr,hu,it,ja,ko,pl,pt_BR,ru,tr,z: If you are using IBM Rational Team Concert integration with GitHub or GitHub Enterprise, then you should install this extension to annotate the work item references in commit comments in a GitHub repository. Clicking the work item link will open the work item in Rational Team Concert Web UI.
